title: Striking issues: from labour process to industrial dispute at Grunwick and Gate Gourmet
abstract:
This article applies a feminist intersectionality approach to analysing the dynamics of the labour process and labour in two workplaces where Asian women workers were in\ud
the forefront of resistance. It stresses the importance of understanding the links between different aspects of workers’ identities
